oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Surgical repair of peripheral detachment of the medical meniscus in 34 cattle
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: Nelson, D. R.
Huhn, J. C.
Kneller, S. K.
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: medial meniscus
joint
ligament
mattress sutures
arthrotomy
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: A detachment of the periphery of the medial meniscus from the joint capsule and medial collateral ligament in 34 cattle was repaired by securing the meniscus to the joint capsule with vertical mattress sutures during arthrotomy. Full article published in Veterinary Record (1990) 127, 571-573
oai_dc:dc.dc:source: American Association of Bovine Practitioners Conference Proceedings; 1990; 61
